categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Brother Claw was a male crime lord who controlled the Brother Claw Gang on the mining world Burnin Konn during the Iron Blockade of the Anoat sector by the Galactic Empire. The Trade Spine League starship Mother of Pearl was shot down in Brother Claw's territory during the blockade, causing the gangster Happy Dapp to send a young smuggler into the criminal's territory to recover the vessel's cargo.
Brother Claw was first mentioned in the video game Star Wars: Uprising which was released on mobile platforms in 2015.
